text: Concealing a Burglar is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithConcealing a BurglarRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Arthur V. Johnson, Florence Lawrence, and Harry Solter. ==Actors== * Arthur V. Johnson as Mr. Brown * Florence Lawrence as Mrs. Brown * Harry Solter as Mr. Wells * Linda Arvidson * George Gebhardt as Dinner Guest * Robert Harron as Valet * Jeanie MacPherson as Dinner Guest * Mack Sennett as The Waiter / A Policeman ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Concealing a Burglar
